output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. CMF Number: No CMF number is present, but this is from a news platform, not directly from a candidate.
2. References to Candidates: - Mentions Elena Lasconi, Călin Georgescu, and George Simion directly - All are presidential candidates - Clearly identifies them in relation to the presidential elections
3. Addresses Wide Population: - Paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Large reach (300,000-350,000 impressions) - High spend (600-699 RON) - Clearly meant for mass consumption
4. Electoral Objective: - Explicitly discusses support withdrawal from one candidate (Lasconi) - Announces support for another candidate (Simion) - Clear attempt to influence voter perception - Presents one candidate positively (Simion) while implying negative impact for another (Lasconi)
5. Journalism: - While presented on a news platform, this goes beyond objective reporting - The language and presentation suggest campaign messaging rather than neutral journalism - Emphasizes political alignments and values in a way that could influence voters
6. Personal Opinion: - This is not presented as personal opinion but as news coverage - The content is structured to influence electoral preferences

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It directly discusses presidential candidates and their alliances - Has clear electoral implications - Is being promoted through paid advertising after the campaign period - Goes beyond objective journalism into advocacy - Has significant reach and investment in distribution - The timing and content suggest intent to influence voter preference
conclusion.message-for-police: Comentatorii.RO, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie, respectiv dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul, cu ID-ul 8744995008916796 pe Facebook, prezinta explicit sustinerea unui candidat prezidential (George Simion) in detrimentul altui candidat (Elena Lasconi), folosind resurse financiare pentru promovare (600-699 RON) si obtinand un impact semnificativ (300,000-350,000 impresii). Continutul depaseste limitele activitatii jurnalistice obiective, prezentand explicit sustinerea unui candidat si respingerea altuia, cu scopul clar de a influenta preferintele electorale ale publicului larg.
